fixes.name: Dv01 T-1
fixes.dax_expression:
VAR UseCustom = SELECTEDVALUE('Use Custom Date'[Display As])
VAR DateX = SELECTEDVALUE('Date X (comparison date)'[Display As])
RETURN
IF(
    UseCustom,
    IF(
        'migration_Extract_POC (1) (local copy)'[MAX_DATE -1day] = 'migration_Extract_POC (1) (local copy)'[RpDate],
        'migration_Extract_POC (1) (local copy)'[DV01],
        0
    ),
    IF(
        DateX = 'migration_Extract_POC (1) (local copy)'[RpDate],
        'migration_Extract_POC (1) (local copy)'[DV01],
        0
    )
)
fixes.solution_explanation: Replaced Tableau parameters with SELECTEDVALUE(...) per mapping and converted row-level IF logic into DAX using VARs for parameters. All column references were transformed to 'migration_Extract_POC (1) (local copy)'[ColumnName] format. The logic returns DV01 when the chosen date matches RpDate according to the parameter flag, otherwise 0.
fixes.type_changed_reason: The calculation references Tableau parameters ([Parameters].[Use Custom Date] and [Parameters].[Date X (comparison date)]). Per rules, any formula that references parameters must be created as a measure.
